transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_006397.2 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000221486.5. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.
